name: Pang Pang Terrible
description: A online MMO FPS/proto-Hero Shooter made available by OnGame Brasil in 2005 on Brazil. Unlike other typical military shooting games of the time, it allows users to raise their own characters as they like. And it features bright and unique cartoon characters without any dark or gloomy mood. There's various game modes: Snowfight, Survival/Team Battle, Clan Battle, Pang Gold Battle, Boss Battle, Territory Battle, and Flag Battle. It also has leveling up characters, acquiring items, and shop functions. Deviating from the previous Wear & Tear character system of FPS into a new upbringing & character system. This game started in Korea and was planned for English in 2008 but never opened. The game is shut down now.

This time around marks one of the most jammed packed OLDC’s in the 2.2 era! description: Meet Leo, the courageous firefighter cat, and help him on his exciting adventure as a junior recruit at the fire station! Take on missions that get trickier each time and climb the ranks with the guidance of Commander Nox. Don't worry, you're not alone!

name: Trojan
description: The NES port of Trojan. The game's controls consist of an eight-way joystick and two action buttons. Similarly to Kung-Fu Master or Rush'n Attack, the player jumps by holding the joystick upwards instead of having a dedicated jump button like other side-scrolling action games. Instead, one button is used to swing the sword at enemies and the other button is used to hold the shield to block enemy attacks, including projectiles such as throwing knives and arrows. The shield can be held towards the player while standing or crouching, as well as upwards vertically and diagonally. Some enemies will throw magic balls which will cause the player to lose their sword and shield if they block. During these instances, the player will fight barehanded, with the sword and shield buttons used to punch and kick respectively. The sword and shield will appear on-screen after some point, allowing the player to recover their weapon. Other power-ups includes floating hearts that will restore the player's health and jumping spots where the player can jump higher than usual.

name: Left Right

name: Pink Pong
description: Pink Pong is a classic arcade-style game where two players compete in a fast-paced and skillful showdown. Take control of your paddle and go head-to-head with your opponent in a thrilling battle of reflexes and precision. Use your paddle to bounce the ball past your adversary and score points, but be on guard - they're aiming to do the same! The first player to reach the target score wins. Enjoy the timeless simplicity and competitive fun of this classic arcade game brought to the digital age. Pink Pong is perfect for quick matches and high-energy gaming sessions.

name: Rush'n Attack
description: The NES port of Rush'n Attack, a run & gun shooter by Konami, also known by the title Green Beret, in which the player takes the role of a soldier infiltrating a military base.

name: Eggconsole Hydlide3 PC-8801mkIISR
description:
The concluding chapter of the Hydlide series. Can you, as an adventurer, once again save Fairyland? This is the third installment in the iconic Japanese action RPG series, "Hydlide." and the player once again rises to the occasion to save Fairyland from a new crisis.

In addition to the graphics and sound inherited from the previous title as a sequel to the series, this ambitious work incorporates a moderate amount of various elements, such as the ability to choose a class, the concept of time, the need to eat during adventures, and the need to manage luggage due to the weight of items to be carried.

It can be said that this game title not only appealed to fans of the Hydlide series but also left a lasting impression on numerous gaming enthusiasts.

name: King's Odyssey
description: Ascend the throne and weave your tale of magic, power, and intrigue where your royal decree shapes the destiny of a kingdom.

name: Gravityscape DX
description: Master the Cosmic Challenge: Can you escape the extraterrestrial onslaught?

name: Flame Keeper + Space Cows
description: Dive into Flame Keeper and wield the power of fire on the go as you navigate a fantastical world filled with challenges and magic, and keep the milk flow running in this intergalactic escapade filled with minigames in Space Cows!

name: Raid on Bungeling Bay
description: Raid on Bungeling Bay has the player controlling a helicopter which is on a mission to destroy everything that moves. The only ally is the carrier, which is where the player begins at each level and may return to for repair and pick up bombs, as long as the player manages to protect it from being destroyed. The main goal in each level is to destroy a factory, which requires a steady increasing amount of bombs. Enemy forces include ships, planes, tanks, anti-air guns, and eventually, a large battleship.

name: Spelunker
description: A miner has to find the exit to a world of wonders that is deep in the ground. During his journey he has to collect bombs to destroy rocks in his way, collect keys to open doors and pick up little potions that refresh his timer. Treasure chests can be opened for bonus items.

name: Ways
description: Survive with friends in a post-apocalyptic world, craft weapons, build bases, and wreak havoc on enemies.

name: Sky Kid
description:
The NES Port of Sky Kid. You are the legendary Red Baron, flying a plane through a horizontal side-scrolling scenery set during World War I. To complete a mission, you simply need to get to the landing spot on the other side without being shot down, but you can gain extra points by destroying enemy vehicles and planes. For huge points, pick up a bomb hidden in the level (you will be warned by a sound when approaching it) and drop it on a large structure. If you fail to land on the landing strip, you run out of fuel and crash.

You can only shoot horizontally and diagonally by tilting the plane's nose. When in trouble, perform an aerial loop with the secondary button, this often destroys other planes and avoids bullets. There is a co-op mode with the character Max as well.

name: Tiger Heli
description: The NES port of Tiger Heli, one of the first games developed by Toaplan and published by Taito Corporation in 1985. It is a predecessor to Twin Cobra. The player controls a helicopter named Tiger Heli taking out various enemies along the way.

name: Xibalba
description: Fight your way through the Mayan Underworld in this retro First Person Shooter. The path leads you through lush jungles, eerie catacombs and high tech bases filled with dangerous creatures, traps, vital powerups and weapons.

name: Midnight Monitor: Aldercourt
description: Lost in a series of endless train station hallways, find your way to the exit Platform in this First-Person Anomaly Spotting game set in the Midnight Monitor universe. Watch out for anomalies - If you see any, turn back immediately! Can you find your way out of Aldercourt Station?

name: High School Simulator 2019
description: Let's Play Zombie High School

name: Provenance
description:
Seeing yourself in other people's pictures. Use the right arrow key to advance (or swipe right on mobile).

Originally made for the Bitsyfest jam with the museum theme, but completed much much later.

name: Super Blob Blaster
description: Game for the TwoPointFive Plugin in the Impact Engine

name: Broken Thunder
description: Broken Thunder is a doujin game released in 2007 as a tribute to the Thunder Force series. It was released only in Japan but was quickly pulled from store shelves after negative feedback.

name: Starground
description: Starground is a top-down automation and roguelite experience. Enjoy a truly flexible experience. All progression trees are completely independent from each other. Spend all your time automating, dungeoning, or maybe a bit of both. There's no right way to play the game, and any path you take will let you win. If you want to play together, invite your friends to work on the same things, or divide and conquer each part of the game.

name: City 20
description: Embark on a dystopian-tinged survival sandbox adventure where the world dynamically responds to your actions. Craft your own narrative through a series of choices, navigating harsh environmental conditions and organized factions, and delving into unsolved mysteries.

name: Voidcall
description: A real time strategy game with a low poly sci-fi theme.

name: KKHTA: Security Watch - Part 3
description: The third KKHTA : Security Watch game.

name: Marballs
description: A simple Marble Madness clone with three levels.

name: Marballs 2
description: A sequel to Marballs, now with verticality, orbs and jump pads!

name: Mellow
description: A simple endless game that made during SGDQ 2020.

name: Titanic: A Space Between
description: Titanic: A Space Between is a time-travel horror virtual reality adventure where players get sent back to the RMS Titanic. With a focus on realism and immersion, this multi-layered horror experience provides an extensive mix of puzzles and escape mechanics interwoven in a riveting story.

name: Underrun
description: A twin stick shooter in 256 shades of brown.

name: Super Mario Star Road Retooled
description:
Super Mario Star Road Retooled is an overhauled reassembly of the original Super Mario Star Road by Skelux.

This game features many improvements and alterations to improve the experience.

name: Temtem: Swarm
description: A survivor-like bullet heaven with online co-op up to 3 players

name: SolForge Fusion
description: SolForge Fusion is a card-battling game where players tactically deploy creatures and cast potent spells to outmaneuver their adversaries—each card played levels up, amplifying its power!

name: Truxton Extreme
description: Truxton Extreme, which inherits the DNA from legendary arcade masterpiece Truxton, is a collaboration with manga artist and Toaplan alumni Junya Inoue.

name: Counter-Strike: Source Offensive
description:
Ever wanted to play CS:S just like CS:GO but tired of simple model-changing mods? Then this mod is for you! This is a mod for Counter-Strike: Source, which brings a lot of gameplay features from CS:GO into CS:S, such as:

All weapons from CS:GO (really, all of them!)
All player factions from CS:GO
Panorama-like HUD
Even all agents from CS:GO! (you can switch them in-game whenever you want)
Loadout system (for example, you can use either P2000 or USP-S, depending on what you prefer!)
Gloves that you can also change in-game!
Complete CS:GO shooting mechanics (spray patterns, etc)
New gamemodes: Deathmatch (normal and FFA), Arms Race, Flying Scoutsman, Wingman
CS:GO shaders: Character, WeaponDecal, CustomWeapon and improved phong shading for VertexLitGeneric
CS:GO postprocessing
VScripts
Molotov & Decoy grenades
Playing as bots when dead
CS:GO player animations (v0.10 and above: from the current CS:GO build; below v0.10: from an old CS:GO build)
Ironsights
New cash award system (award for defusing/planting the bomb, different kill rewards for different weapons)
All CS:GO radio commands
CS:GO viewbob
Weapon inspection
New sounds from CS:GO (footsteps, hit sounds, etc)
Unique hands viewmodel for each faction
Unique voice for each faction (bots included)
Carrying hostages just like in CS:GO
Different grenade throw ranges
CS:GO C4 logic (radio message 4 seconds before explosion; it will explode 1 second after going off just like in CS:GO)
Unique voice lines for each grenade throw
English and Russian translations

name: Just Plumbers in Hallowville
description: Just Plumbers in Hallowville is a cooperative horror game where players must control two plumbers to fix pipes, running against the clock. All while trying to survive encounters with their peculiar customers.

name: Batting Champ
description: Batting Champ is a 3D baseball game made by Miniclip. You are a batter and you need to launch the ball as precisely as you can. Play either the easier Minor League, or harder Major League.

name: Count 427
description:
Count 427 is a horror game with theme of the examine of traffic volume.
You sit on a chair on road as a traffic volume examiner and work. If you press a button when a car passes, you will have an unusual experience. If you find something wrong, take a picture.

name: Trepang2: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Become the ultimate badass in Trepang2. Unleash hell on your enemies in this gory action-packed FPS set in the future and stop at nothing to get your revenge.

The Deluxe Edition includes:

- Trepang2 Full Game
- Season Pass including Survival Mode DLC (Available Now) and Story DLC coming soon.

name: Crop Haven
description: Inspired by the older Harvest Moon games such as A Wonderful Life and Animal Parade, Crop Haven is the story of a kingdom in danger, with only your skills and wits available to help the monstrous, mysterious people living there. With the Vampire King's support and the rest of the townsfolk's tips, can you singlehandedly save Crop Haven from famine and drought?

name: Resortopia
description: Come earn Cookies with Udon, write your unique story, and build your very own 5-star resort!

name: Choco-Ken no Omise: Patisserie & Sweets Shop Game
description: A DS game in the Choco-Ken series.

name: Toy Story 3
description:
In the Toy Story 3 help Buzz, Woody and the rest of the Toys ensure no toy gets left behind. Dive into to all new heroic adventures in Story Mode or let your imagination run wild in the exiting new open world of Toy Box Mode! Come and play to infinity and beyond.

PS2/PSP exclusive version of the video game.

name: Choco-Ken no Dekitate Sweets Wagon
description: A DS game in the Choco-Ken series.

name: Watashi no Happy Manner Book
description: A Nintendo DS game by Taito.

name: Yomesou de Yomenai Kanji DS
description: A DS game that teaches how to write kanji.

name: Byakuya Monogatari: Winchester-ke no Matsuei
description: A visual novel released in 1988.

name: Chiralmori
description: This is a fan disc of the Nitro+ Chiral characters, featuring 3 mini games. Various characters from Togainu no Chi and Lamento -Beyond the Void- are included.

name: Mermaid Swamp
description: This is a remake of the original game that adds new art, upgraded graphics, Japanese voice acting, reworked puzzles, and various quality of life and gameplay improvements.

name: Merry Go Round
description: A cyberpunk visual novel released in 1996.

name: Omerta Chinmoku no Okite: The Legacy
description: A PSP port of Omertà: Chinmoku no Okite.

name: Touka Gettan: Koufuu no Ryouou

name: Touka Gettan: Koufuu no Ryouou Deluxe Pack
description:
This edition includes a mini-drama DVD "Gentou Momotsuki Soushi".

It also bundles with "Kao no nai Tsuki Select Story", featuring a PS2-exclusive Suzuna after story.

name: Bug Quest
description: Welcome to BUG WORLD! Befriend many strange and silly bugs as you journey through its many zones on your BUG QUEST.

name: Inquisitor
description:
Inquisitor is played with a mouse only. The goal of the game is to be the first faction to reach 3 points. Each round you will select a number of personnel required for the mission. If no assimilants are present on the away team or they choose not to act at this time the mission will be a success and you will score a point, if an assimilant is present they will often sabotage the mission and it will fail, scoring a point for the assimilants.

There are also two interrogation rounds where you can determine the faction of a single personnel. Use these carefully as attempting to identify assimilants is key!

name: The Last Sorrow
description:
"Wake up, Young Sorrow..."

You are the Last of the Sorrow, a small group of humans living on the brink of extinction in a harsh and dangerous world that your kind once ruled over.

Fight your way out of the Ancient Fortress in which you have been held prisoner for so long. Escape the Prison and find the other Sorrows...

"There is much to do..."

name: Purrfectly Hidden Cats: Kittenrock
description:
Purrfectly Hidden Cats - Kittenrock" welcomes you to a richly interactive 2D world set in a picturesque mountain resort. The hand-drawn scene in Kittenrock is a labor of love, brimming with intricate details, natural beauty, and humorous Easter eggs, inviting thorough exploration and discovery.

The gameplay blends classic hidden object mechanics with a unique twist—interactive people and cats around the map, enhancing the engagement and depth of the experience. Your primary goal is to spot the skillfully hidden cats that merge seamlessly into the scenic resort surroundings, often revealed through playful interactions with the environment and its inhabitants.

description: Clone of "Too Cool!" from the PC game The Little Mermaid II: Return to the Sea; the graphics from the original are retained. The player must collect coins scattered throughout a maze, in order to unfreeze and collect a trident in the center of the screen.

name: Alive
description: The story takes place after the events of OFF. You, The Puppeteer and your old puppet, The Batter are sent back once again to the old world that didn't completely die after the Batter's ending. It is still Alive. When you two are sent to what used to be Zone 0, you notice that strange things are happening within the zone, and maybe these things are also happening to the others. What will you do in this "new" world? Will the Batter eradicate it once again? It's up to you to find out.

description: Developed by DreamFactory, an isometric entry to the classic shmup Xevious series, released for mobile phones!

Thanks to all our contestants! Have fun!

name: Kingmakers
description: Go back in time to a war-torn medieval era with a vast arsenal of modern weapons, change the course of history, and save the future in this epic action/strategy sandbox. Build your kingdom, grab a gun, and lead an army of thousands into massive, real-time simulated battles — solo or in co-op.

name: You're Boned
description:
A powerful psychic meets his end, and loses his body! Even so, he's not out for the count yet. Stranded in Hell, all he can do is fight his way out - and even with his psychic powers that's easier said than done!

You're Boned is a top-down roguelike shooter where you're a psychic skull trying to take out the underworld and re-earn your spot among the living!

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2: Official Level Design Contest - Autumn 2020
description:

The entries are as follows:

name: Yumpr
description: Yumpr has crashed in hostile enviroment! Filled up with dangerous creatures and obstacles. Help him survive this crazy world!

name: Zahak
description: Zahak is a roguelike action RPG set in the captivating world of Persian mythology. Battle relentless waves of enemies and navigate the magical landscapes of Mount Damavand. Unleash the ancient power within your cursed bloodline to challenge the dark legacy of the Serpent King.

name: ZiDouQianWen
description: I am a destiny question and answer game based on Zi Wei Dou Shu, a Chinese astrology system. Come and explore the mysteries of destiny with me!

name: Zero Hero
description: Zero hero is an endless roguelike, each wave of enemies and unique combinations. Collect Waboshi to buy new weapons and upgrades outside the game and get further and further in the challenges with the number of kills and waves. Challenge yourself with new weapons, new powers and challenges!

name: Zomb Bomb
description: A fast pace retro arcade shooter. Fight waves of zombies and dragons with a great gun collection. Battle five wild bosses all while trying to keep the high score.

name: Zombie Colony
description: Manage a zombie colony. Mine, build, master new technologies, do everything to capture these pitiful people and their juicy brains!

name: Zombies!!! Board Game
description: Zombies!!! puts you in the middle of the action in this video game adaptation of the hit board game. In order to escape the ever advancing zombie horde, players must use a combination of wits and brawn to be the first to the heliport and certain escape.

name: Wizard War Online
description: Wizard War Online offers a P2P game mode and a game mechanic you are not used to. While flying with the sweeper, you will experience a different flight experience thanks to the customizable maneuver settings. Make strategic moves and pay attention to timing while fighting your enemies.

name: Wizarducks and the Lost Hat
description: Have daily adventures in dungeons and exploring unmapped areas, some far away, some hidden in your own home. Cast spells to fight enemies and to solve puzzles blocking your way. Befriend the villagers, help them decorate the town. Oh, and pet your dog, he likes it.

name: Wizard Realm
description: Wizard Realm is a dynamic game with rogue-like elements set in a fantastic 3D world. It enables players to develop various battle strategies using a multitude of magical skills to survive. It enriched with an advanced item system.

name: W.I.T.S: Initiation
description: A puzzle game where you are the newest recruit to a government agency dedicated to stopping cyber crimes. You must prove yourself and level up in the system by solving puzzles, at the same time there is a mystery to uncover at the agency. Who can you trust?

name: With in the Obscurity
description: A first-person perspective mystery puzzle-solving game where players immerse themselves in the role of characters involved in each episode's abnormal event to uncover the truth. The plan is to release 2 episodes per month, totaling 6 episodes per season.

name: Wizzerd Quest
description: Wizzerd Quest is a bite-sized open-world RPG with full split-screen co-op. Its aesthetic is straight out of the mid 1990's, and it's designed to be a fun little excursion without wasting your time. Play the entire game for free with zero microtransactions or DRM!

name: Wolf Survival
description: Experience the epic adventure of a wolf in Wolf Survival ! Hunt unique prey in diverse territories, follow the captivating story of the 3 dominant clans, and uncover the hidden corners of this vast open world by completing exciting challenges.

name: Wonderway
description: Wonderway is a puzzle game where the direction of gravity can be changed. Get to the goal by moving and manipulating items which interact with gravity.

name: Magic Card: CZ12
description: This is a very casual strategy card game that is very easy and simple. The goal is to win more coins and become the richest man in the world. The original intention of the game is to activate the brain and turn the tide against the wind.

name: Woodsy Whatnots
description: Quest across a mysterious wooded kingdom, full of wacky creatures, and spin-smash your way through even wackier monsters! Meet colourful companions in this Party-Based RPG, and use their abilities to face villainous overlords in the name of adventure.

name: Wiblu
description: Wiblu: The Search for the Fire Tea, is a captivating video game with German mythology, following Wiblu's quest to find the legendary Fire Tea to save her sick grandmother.

name: Wildwood: Hearth & Horizon
description: WILDWOOD: Hearth & Horizon is an immersive first-person survival game focused on exploration, settlements, and trade routes. Build a base, fight enemies and loot rare treasure. Work with your friends to carve out a toehold in a harsh and unforgiving wilderness.

name: Wildsong
description: A monster-taming Beast-Em-Up where you fight alongside elemental beasts and help your invoker fight their way through steel and elemental magic across four elemental shrines on the path to the mysterious Ruined Throne...

name: Wildlife Rescue Simulator
description: Get to the chopper and fly to isolated places to rescue terrified animals from man made disasters. Take photos of your adventures and share it with your loyal supporters to get donations. Upgrade your equipment in order to rescue even more animals.

name: Wild Gunslinger
description: is a strategy game, a mixture of clicker and Western-style idle. You and your settlers need to swiftly establish a settlement, provide the front with necessary resources, and manage the economy of your city...

name: Willy's Wonderland: The Game
description: Willy’s Wonderland: The Game is a 2.5D beat ‘em up game based on the cult film of the same name, in which a group of Animatronics come to life and slaughter people who dare visit Willy’s Wonderland.

name: Windah Horror Adventure 2
description: Join Windah Basudara and Jaya Esport friends in this challenging rage game. Each character boasts unique skills. Confront Indonesian Ghosts as epic bosses. Get ready for intense battles and unmatched horror!

name: Win or Crash!
description: Win or Crash! is a heart-pumping racing game that will push your driving skills to the limit.

name: Winter Night
description: "Winter Night" presents a story inspired by beliefs in Thailand. Players will experience the atmosphere of an ancient, mysterious mansion.presented through 2D PixelArt.

name: West Town Defense
description: Gunslingers and bandits are storming the town! You must stop the crimes and rescue the town! This is a tough mission Sheriff, be careful. A classic, wave based survival game.

name: Where Is George
description: George is a sneaky little cat that loves to hide. Can you find him? In this free to play game you need to find 100 cats in beautiful hand drawn levels. Are you able to find them all?

name: WhichWayOut?
description: WhichWayOut? is a dark themed physics puzzle platformer.

name: White Cat Town Mystery
description: White Cat Town Mystery is a visual novel/adventure game about an anthropomorphic cat named Lumi. Help him explore atmospheric and magical town, meet old friends again, make hard choices, and go through supernatural challenges. What you choose decides the fate of the town—and Lumi himself!

name: Whispers in the Void
description: The main hero John Eikts wakes up in a mysterious room for supernatural creatures. Anomalies escape, wreaking havoc. Eikts must navigate the chaos while uncovering his dark past. As he approaches freedom, a shocking twist reveals that he is not a victim, but one of them.

name: Whisper Of The Curse
description: "Whisper of the Curse" is a 4-player online co-op psychological horror game where you and your team will perform various rituals and spells to eliminate the curse and fend off cursed entities. At the same time, you'll need to avoid being hunted by these malevolent entities.

name: Whirlight: No Time To Trip
description: In the heart of Verice Bay, a brilliant idea takes shape in the hands of an eccentric inventor and an eclectic artist. Follow Margaret and Hector in a point-and-click graphic adventure that will take you to the edge of space and time to help them avert imminent danger.

name: Whispers of Prague: The Executioner's Last Cut
description: Classic first-person point-and-click adventure game set in contemporary Prague. As a programmer and treasure hunter, you embark on a long journey to uncover the secrets of the infamous Executioner. Your task will be complicated by a sect of fanatic cultists and your own unexplained heritage.

name: The Twilight Witch
description: The Twilight Witch is a 2D pixel art RPG where you play as Mael, a young man from the village of New Larton. After your home-town is attacked and ravaged by a mysterious figure, you venture forth to tell of what happened and maybe, just maybe, find a way to stop the hooded aggressor…

name: Elhosea
description: Experience 'Elhosea,' a psychological horror walking simulator. As Father Immanuel navigates eerie streets, unravels tragic orphanage secrets, and confronts moral dilemmas. Survive haunting nightmares in this visceral journey through psychological terror.

name: Never wake up
description: psychological survival horror

name: Echolight
description: Echolight ist ein actionbasiertes Roguelike-Spiel, in welchem du die Welt vor dem Chaos gefährlicher Monster, mit Hilfe der Waffen der Götter des Tages und der Nacht retten musst.

name: Palm Sugar: A Village Story
description: Embark on a pixel RPG journey in 'పల్లెటూరు - PalmSugar.' Battle drug lords, wield unique weapons, and immerse yourself in South Indian culture. Telugu & English localization. Will you save the village?

name: Dwarfs Delight
description: Join the adventure of Dwarfs Delight, an explosive multiplayer game where dwarves battle in a tavern for glory and beer! Face off against your friends in this couch game, where every mug counts. Get ready for laughter and unforgettable moments. Ideal for nights with friends!

name: Panda?
description: This is a game where you select two panels and match the same pictures. Let's compete for the best time without getting confused by small differences.

name: Shotengai 10
description: Suddenly, I realized that I was in a Japanese shopping district that I was unfamiliar with. An unusual shopping street where even if you proceed blindly, you will end up returning to the entrance. Let's exit from this shopping street by relying on the hints left behind.

name: Shoomer Booter
description: An unexpected find at an antique shop, a soy boy stumbles upon an ancient beard ointment. Each night, he slips into a dream where he embodies a Sumerian warrior, tracing his lineage to Gibil. In this fantastical realm, he courageously confronts demons that lurk within the mystical attics of Irkalla.

name: Plants in Rush
description: Plants in rush is a multiplayer and single player game. Its fun, fast paced, and simple. You have to chose between 4 fruits throw projectiles spawn lasers turrets and more! it has 3 modes deathmatch team deathmatch and soccer!

name: Artificial Life Simulator
description: Artificial Life Simulator is a relaxing and colorful simulation game where you create artificial life forms based on particle interactions. The particles interact with each other through forces, resulting in unique emergent behaviors.

name: Master Builder Simulator
description: Dive into virtual brick-building with Master Builder Simulator! Explore solo or with friends in Sandbox, Model Building, Co-op, or versus modes. Unleash your inner Master Builder in endless creative adventures!

name: Legend of the Nine Colored Deer
description: "Legend of the Nine-Colored Deer" is an adventurous third-person puzzle game filled with Chinese mythology. Seeking the trail of the Nine-Colored Deer, solving puzzles, and unraveling the legend's mysteries. Explore a charming and fantastical world of adventure.

name: Tomorrow's Love Puzzle
description: Play as 'Ming Tian' in a romantic game, where you meet six unique women. From dominant to innocent, mysterious, dignified, cheerful, to clingy, your choices determine Ming Tian's love story. Who will he choose? You decide.

name: Feeling Death
description: A Game Where You're Killed for Becoming a Couple.

name: Trap for the Heir
description: Gwen is an experienced werewolf mercenary. One day, she comes across a simple and very monetary order. But who is her mysterious customer? And will it be so easy to get to destination alive? New friends, old enemies and maybe a meeting with love...

name: Quallet
description: Quallet is a game where you are a criminal in the land of Qualle, but be careful to not get caught by the police of Qualle!

name: Node
description: N.O.D.E. is a 2.5D puzzle platformer with Timeline-based navigation set in a Cold War era nuclear complex. Plan a route for your robot, strategize, sequence commands and execute them to navigate between checkpoints. Try again. And again. Influence the story with your choices and solve the mystery.

name: Full-Scale Invasion
description: Full-Scale Invasion is an armchair general RTS that puts the player directly in the battle as they command ground-to-space armies from the bridge of their very own capital ship.

name: Save the Villainess
description: What if you woke up as a villainess in a romance novel where someone wants you dead? Guide your villainess by solving mysteries and making choices that lead you closer to romance, revenge… or death. In this mystery/horror otome isekai game, can you Save the Villainess?

name: Édgimon
description: Catch wild Égdimon, dig, build, craft, and explore an infinite world, in this open-world creature-taming and role-playing game.

name: Mechanophagia
description: Mechanophagia is a challenging bullet hell shooter with roguelite elements, set in a dark and gritty sci-fi world. Blast through waves of fleshy aberrations and defeat monstrous bosses. Can you outmaneuver the relentless enemy onslaught and save the robots from their inevitable extinction?

name: Out Of Mind
description: Out Of Mind merges psychological thriller and puzzle genres, allowing players to confront their fears. Get lost in labyrinthine environments, solve mysterious puzzles, and unveil dark secrets. The game stands out with atmospheric design and a unique storyline.

name: Away from the light
description: You find yourself in a critical situation on the brink of departure, without awareness indicating whether you have departed from the world of the living. In this surreal and mysterious dimension, your actions dictate the fate of this event, whether it's the end or a new beginning.

name: Eternal Reckoning
description: Eternal Reckoning is an action-packed Metroidvania following the story of an elf taking their revenge for the atrocities of Ragnarok. Slay a wide range of dangerous bosses! Explore a world full of secrets and rich mythology-inspired lore!

name: Ukraine War 2022
description: Ukraine War 2022 is a real-time, tactical land and air warfare simulation game focusing on the ongoing war between Ukraine and Russia.

name: Era of Darkness
description: Era of Darkness is a dungeon exploration RPG that organizes parties to explore dungeons, collects loot and upgrades facilities and party.

name: Surveillance Simulator
description: Using surveillance equipment to complete a series of tasks, or lighting up a cigarette and gazing at the real-time footage from various cameras on the screen.

name: Mr. Akun's Jump
description: This game is a casual adventure game where players use the mouse to click on Akun to generate a parabola, allowing him to jump from one platform to another. The goal is to guide him to the highest peak to retrieve the lost basketball!

name: SCP
description: Explore, craft, and survive in a post-apocalyptic world where SCP anomalies roam freely. Brace yourself for nightly assaults as SCP-049's twisted creations close in.

name: The Last Rose
description: Kuri Rose was dead, until she wasn't. Now she stands in defiance to a world that is slowly disappearing in this apocalypse adventure visual novel.

name: Njuma
description: Njuma is a 2D narrative driven pixel game with multiple endings. Be the difference your family needs as they draw their final breath.

name: Into The Depths
description: A classic grid & turn-based roguelike, procedurally generated dungeon crawler, aimed at re-creating the games of yesteryear.

name: Kuudere Funk
description: With the city overrun with supernatural beings and occurrences, it is up to two women to restore the city to its former state. In order to accomplish such a task, sexual rituals must be performed by these women at the shrines scattered throughout the city…

name: Tiny Battles
description: Tiny Battles is a tactical action auto-battler where battles take place automatically in the arena.

name: Tale of the Seas
description: It is a classic gem elimination game, a gem exchange elimination game that exercises eyesight.

name: Stack Slayer
description: Stack Slayer is defense builder where you stack cards to harvest material, craft equipment, build structures, and upgrade structures for fighting and protect ancient core from the invade monster.

name: Starters Orders Touch Horse Racing
description: Starters Orders Touch now on desktop from ! A brand new GUI and improved game play and the most advanced simulation engine to date cement Starters Orders as the No.1. horse racing management series. Available here on Steam once out of beta.

name: Rockit!
description: Rockit! is a difficult arcade game about trying to not crash rockets. Duck and weave around progressively challenging obstacles to be crowned the ultimate rocket pilot.

name: Sync Your Mind
description: Immerse in rhythm's embrace with Sync Your Mind. A 3D musical odyssey where beats and creativity collide. Conquer rhythmic realms or compose your own. Sync up, rise up, and let the harmonies of your mind unfold! 🚀 #SyncYourMind #RhythmGaming

name: Gun Gladiator
description: Brutally defeat your enemies, upgrade your equipment, influence the crowd, master the arena and become the new champion in a gory and fast-paced retro FPS set in a post-apocalyptic world.

name: Infinite Chump
description: A surreal, mutated roguelike where you are a chump, infinitely.

name: HamSumo
description: BONK YOUR FRIENDS in this action-packed, roly-poly, multiplayer action game! Choose your favorite hamster to duke it out with your friends in the most adorable (and explosive!) PvP arena! Unleash unique and powerful Star Moves to blast away the competition!

name: F.I.T.
description: Challenge your spatial awareness and reflexes in F.I.T. An addictive puzzle game where you are the master of your own geometric shape, and must skillfully fit into falling blocks of various sizes and shapes to survive and thrive in this captivating arcade style game to achieve the highest score!

name: Dragon of Steelthorne
description: Rule a mighty city, fight battles and go on adventures as the Ardent or Ardessa of the city of Lake Steelthorne. Find love, power, and a secret that could change the world.

name: Prank Heart
description: Phantom Theif vs. Detective slapstick online battle action!!! Enjoy lively and funny PvP with multiple items such as Rocket launcher, Invisibility cloak, Bananas, Soccer ball bomb!

name: Legend Of Apophyxis
description: Embark on an epic journey filled with mystical enemies and powerful allies in this action-packed game. Harness your strength, defeat foes, and rise as the true hero of Myrr

name: The Bit's Escape
description: Bit's is a small machine built in a underground factory, his dream is to escape and discover life beyond what is below the earth.

name: Lexicon
description: A casual word-forming game. Swap letters to form words and score! Customizable bonus word list useful for lessons or a reading challenge.

name: Survivaluck
description: Survivaluck is a low-poly survival, where you can bend your luck. Discover rare loot, collect resources & craft better gear to break free from the Curse.

name: UntilZombieDown
description: "Until Zombies Down" is a top-down roughlike shooting game.Eliminate zombies in different environments and locations.Whether day and night or blizzards and sandstorms.Upgrade yourself in action,buy items to improve your system.Complete the goal and come back alive to earn rewards.

name: Fire and Rescue
description: Fires have broken out all over the city! Use your portable water tank to extinguish raging fires and carry innocent civilians to safety. Play by yourself or simultaneously with a friend to see who is the best fire-fighter in FIRE AND RESCUE!

name: Commandos Pro Simulator
description: Superfast action-packed shooter to play in single mode or multiplayer with your friends! Play from first person view or switch to third view at anytime during this hardcore game. Select to play for special commandos forces or for bad terrorists criminals. No time - start shooting left and right!

name: Pigeon's Mission
description: Enjoy a whimsical pixel-art adventure crafted from a 6-year-old's art & vision. Navigate Pepper Pines as Archie, a pigeon with clever attacks & CRAZY power-ups, on a dangerous quest to save his parents. Experience a blend of nostalgia & fresh, fun gameplay in a world ruled by imagination & wonder.

name: The house of the missing hands
description: A first person flat/VR survival horror game where you have to escape the dark farm where you are being kept against your will after finding out the package you were delivering contained a human hand. Use stealth to avoid The hand collector while unraveling the reason he collects hands.

name: Pay Me In Colors
description: Pay Me In Colors is a 2D platformer game with multiple mechanics, six different worlds and over 40 challenging levels. Face meteors, gravity changing, spikes falling and missiles coming in your direction while you try to recover the colors back to your world. A game inspired by the classics of the past.

name: Easy puzzle: Streets
description: Is a logic game in which the goal of the game is to rearrange the tiles to get the final picture

name: Hyperspace Deck Command
description: Hyperspace Deck Command is a sci-fi card-battler roguelite. Deploy spaceships that operate on individual turn timers, combine a wide variety of cards into powerful decks and use dual-use status effects to defeat the hegemonising swarm intelligence.

name: The Return of the King
description: This game tests hands-on ability and brain thinking.

name: Forge Front
description: Defend magical orbs from goblin invaders in 'Forge Front.' Build and upgrade structures strategically across diverse landscapes in this FPS tower defense adventure!

name: No Surrender Heroes
description: No Surrender Heroes is a real-time epic battle game set in the No Surrender Universe.

name: Dino Dino
description: Playfully extend your knowledge about dinosaurs in a collection of mini games. Created in cooperation with the German Paleontological Society, featuring voice recordings and hand-drawn illustrations, Dino Dino sets out to awaken your kids's interest in complex topics while being a lot of fun.

name: Red Snow
description: Experience the ultimate fusion of snowboarding and combat in RED SNOW! Navigate perilous slopes, battle enemy forces, and execute stunning tricks to earn cash in this epic board-n-sword adventure.

name: Node Farm
description: Node Farm is a game about building a fully automated farm using nodes. Connect nodes, harvest and sell veggies, buy new islands, discover new nodes, and automate the process - all in a cozy farm simulation formula!

name: ReMove
description: ReMove is a sokoban puzzle game about moving and giving up your movement to escape an experiment laboratory

name: Life Code
description: A semi openworld Third Person - Action Adventure Cyberpunk/Post Apocalyptic style story game. You can use multiple weapons, attachments, vehicles, close combat skills and bullet time to break through your enemies.

name: Flooftopia
description: Flooftopia is a non-combat-based MMORPG set in a fantasy world filled with adorable Floofs. Shape your adventure by level up skills, professions, taking on bosses, customizing houses, and join other players and make a village. There's always something to explore in the world of Flooftopia!

name: Realms of Arcana
description: Realms of Arcana is an engaging RPG set in a mysterious world shaped by the legacy of a fallen empire, featuring deep exploration, crafting, strategic combat with melee, magic, stealth, and a storyline where every choice impacts the game's rich narrative.

name: BoboInvasion
description: BoboInvasion is a classic spaceshooter game. Face waves of aliens with increasing difficulty, dodge their attacks, and choose a ship upgrade that suits your style to win

name: Deep Scanner
description: Due to your debts, you have been sent to the BAORA9 production facility. A quiet place, if it weren't for the raids by local creatures. Will you be able to complete your work and leave BAORA9 safe and sound?

name: Fighting breakthrough
description: Fighting breakthrough is a 2D platformer, where you take on the role of a soldier who must fight his way through enemy forces and complete his mission. Exciting levels filled with shooting, dynamic battles and intense combat missions await you.

name: Mushroom Moonrise
description: Mushroom Moonrise, it's a delightful blend of strategy, art, and serenity. Inspired by the theme 'It's Spreading!', it transforms the subtle art of mushroom growth into an enthralling strategic conquest.

name: Telf AG
description: The strategy of Telf AG is based on the process of mining, processing and exporting nickel. The tests are hidden in logical mini-games, victory in which brings profit. The goal of the player is to establish production, build supply logistics and obtain an economic effect.

name: Scape
description: Escape insurmountable debt in a haunted asylum. Solve puzzles, confront vengeful spirits, and survive the chilling unknown. Can you make it out?

name: Puzzle Journey
description: "Puzzle Journey" is the kind of game that captivates you for hours on end. It's perfect for players looking to unwind alone or those wanting to spend quality time with family and friends. Are you ready to take on the challenge? Come and experience "Puzzle Journey" today!

name: Traveler's Refrain
description: Wield your magical instrument and defy the mecha-goddesses of fate in this Song-Casting Story Driven Action-RPG. Explore a forbidden forest as Traveler, and help him reunite with his long lost love as you fight through abominations and solve mysterious puzzles, all while an ancient conflict unfolds.

name: Iron Line
description: Iron Line is a tower defense game where you are one of a few, train conductors capable of traversing on the Iron Line. Will you survive the onslaught, or get an express ticket to the afterlife?

name: Warfare Legacy Collection
description: Warfare 1917 and Warfare 1944, updated for modern hardware, join forces in Warfare Legacy Collection. Experience the intense tug-of-war of WW1 and WW2 and engage in strategic battles that defined an era. Command waves of troops, unleash tactical prowess, and even customize your own battlefields!

name: Magic Duck
description: Magic Duck is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements, where you will take on the role of an amazing magical duck with a magic hat that has amazing magical powers. An exciting adventure awaits you in which you will fight against fire dragons and other magical creatures.

name: Jungle Bloody Operation
description: Jungle: Bloody Operation is a top-down TDS shooter where you have to shoot from many waves of dangerous creatures! Your character, Jake, finds himself in the thick of the wild, separated from his squad. Now he has to survive in this gloomy and hostile environment.

name: Galaxy Raiders
description: Galaxy Raiders - 2D Adventure game, where you find yourself in the role of a spaceship captain, you have to travel to different parts of the galaxy, completing missions. Your ship is equipped with various weapons that will help you cope with enemy attacks and destroy opponents.

name: Plague Doctor
description: Plague Doctor is a Gritty, Dark and Gory replication of the Medieval Black Plague. You play as a somewhat anti-villain, a plague doctor. Immerse yourself like never before in an open world Medieval Kingdom - Riddled with the plague.

name: Legends of the Round Table
description: Lead the Knights of the Round Table through King Arthur's legend in a unique RPG, full of honor, magic and romance. Plunge into a colorful world inspired by medieval art, tales and music. Undertake perilous quests and fiercely defend your kingdom to make the flower of chivalry blossom again.

name: Cura
description: This game is a 3D puzzle game where you control the box-shaped character ``CURA'' to conquer stages and reach the goal.

name: TDS
description: TDS - Tower ▪ Defense ▪ Strategy. Control Vessels. Utilize their uniquely deep, yet simple set of towers. Create an everchanging defense. Protect your Basin at all costs. A Tower Defense, Real-Time Strategy Hybrid

name: Slime, Fire and Soul
description: You enter the DUNGEON and try to get as far as possible.

name: Lost Dungeon
description: Lost Dungeon is a dungeon exploration game with randomly generated elements, by collecting treasures, matching equipment, to defeat the evil creatures that occupy the depths of the dungeon.

name: Aurorae
description: Aurorae adopts the art form of combination of anime drawing and cartoon characters. The game adopts a horizontal combat mode, combined with a very rich and diverse character skill design.

name: Dudelings: Arcade Sportsball
description: Dudelings: Arcade Sportsball is a fast-paced sportslike. A cross between Pong and Foosball, this title brings high-energy local mutiplayer fun to the table!

name: Stardustry
description: You are the new manager of Stardustry, the pinnacle of resource extraction and production in outer space! Mine ores, process them and create complex resources in this chill industry simulator set in space.

name: Gravity Pro
description: In this arcade game, use your paddle to strike the ball and shatter bricks. Gravity and physics are both your allies and challenges. Master skill and precision to navigate dynamic levels and get high scores. Every hit, every angle, and every rebound plays a crucial role in determining your success.

name: Defenders
description: You thought you landed alone. You were wrong. Now you must defend yourself against waves of enemies in order to survive. Vanquish thousands of foes, master your abilities, call in reinforcements, and survive in a quest to become a true Defender.

name: The August Before
description: The August Before is a meditative narrative 3D puzzle about cleaning up, sorting out and packing up your life before moving on. Clean up and don’t forget your old belongings on your way to the new life!

name: Voidsayer
description: The world has fallen into darkness, cursed by the Abyss. You are one of the many hapless survivors at risk of being consumed. Unlike others, you have a chance to fight back. Voidsayer is a dark monster tamer jRPG. Assemble your monster team, take on eldritch horrors, and return hope to the world.

name: Superstore Simulator
description: Develop your store, order goods, and sell, sell, sell. Hire employees and take care of customers. Enjoy a rather humorous approach to trading and running a store where you can look forward to hours upon hours of great entertainment.

name: Octameta
description: A 3D-styled puzzle-solving burning brain indie game, using the Pocket Cube to restore objects. A story about AI's journey to recreate the history of human science

name: Time Machine Bronzeville
description: A storytelling game that explores the stories, cityscape, and legend and lore of Chicago's South Side ca. 1940. Encounter both heroes and scoundrels in 3D interactive scenes that transport the visitor into detailed recreations of this vanished community as it was between the World Wars.

name: The Quantum Conflict
description: Jump into action-packed space dogfights with up to 8 players (or AI's) locally or over Remote-Play-Together. Use outlandish sci-fi weapons, including the wormhole maker and time altering munitions while avoiding asteroids, wormholes, planet gravity, and other hazards.

name: CapitalismCraft
description: Welcome to the wonderful world of capitalism! Exploit your workers to earn money! Hire managers to crush their spirits and drive them harder, then fire them once you’ve achieved your ends! Be agile, ruthless, merciless, become the richest CEO in the world, winning in rapid clicker management!

name: Shlemo
description: Action-packed stories of 3 different guys who kill people to get to a briefcase with supposed wealth. The question is which of them will get it, will it solve their problems, which of them will die and what is in the briefcase?

name: Gun vs. Zombies
description: Gun vs. Zombies is a thrilling showdown where precision meets undead mayhem. Take control of a dynamic gun affected by physics as you fend off waves of zombies hungry for a brain feast. Compete against others on the global leaderboard by showcasing your shooting skills.

name: Moyu world
description: This is an exciting game with very simple rules and high degrees of freedom.

name: Eye of death
description: This is a parkour game.

name: Greedshot
description: Greedshot is a first-person rogue-lite shooter with procedurally generated locations. Play alone or with friends in co-op mode, facing merciless enemies and environments

name: Cyrus The Virus
description: You play as Cyrus, a notorious pirate, skilled in stealth and cunning. The game emphasizes non-lethal takedowns and strategic gameplay, where players must navigate through environments using shadows, distractions, and environmental elements to their advantage.

name: Strange Hunting Grounds
description: A casual hack and slash game that conquers hell by creating a powerful expedition through a variety of skill & weapon combinations

name: Jack and Bursh
description: Jack and Bursh is a Roguelike challenge game that combines magic, action, and shooting elements. Players will play various characters with abilities and constantly challenge their limits in a different world!

name: Island Rise
description: "Island Rise" is a captivating survival and adventure game where players build their own island, uncover its mysteries, and engage in gathering, farming, crafting, dungeon exploration, and epic boss battles. Stranded on a mysterious island, you must navigate its secrets and challenges to thrive.

name: Dream Runner
description: Collect memory shards, get away from monsters and survive until you have nowhere to run anymore! Dream Runner is a Platformer Runner Survivor casual game with rogue-lite elements, where your choices can allow you to quickly change your strategy for the better or worst.

name: Project Windfall
description: Project Windfall is a open-world, third-person, anime-styled, action RPG where you follow the story of Lyare van Windfall - a charismatic, adventurous, young woman & the sole heir of house Windfall.

name: FawnRun
description: The only level 2D casual mini-game there is please keep moving.

name: Mysterious prophecy
description: This is a parkour game that is not just about running, but about climbing, jumping, and crossing all obstacles, constantly running forward.

name: Enci's Solution
description: “Enci’s Solution” tells the story of Ji’we who leaves his home behind to go on a journey to the surface of planet Regalia. Living underground his whole life- with the help of Enci and other characters he meets on his way, Ji’we uncovers challenges in a world governed by an AI.

name: Morph!
description: Morph is a casual game in which you can transform into a bunch of objects in the world of the game, chasing each other, or hiding quietly, and so on.

name: Poroto
description: Poroto is a chaotic arcade adventure - blast red pegs in action-packed platforming! Jump and run across vibrant levels, strategically bouncing and shooting to eliminate all the red chaos. Pinball-style mechanics, bite-sized levels, and a pumping soundtrack make this an unforgettable experience.

name: Kadie's Uncanny Valley
description: Time stands still in Kadie's Uncanny Valley. Deep below the surface lies a failed invention. Her name is Kadie, said to be the first truly life-like doll. Use every aspect of the environment to your survival, avoid what’s hiding in the shadows, and find out for yourself how truly life-like Kadie is

name: Don't Be Afraid 2
description: Descend deep into the nightmare that seamlessly blends with reality in this uncanny horror escape room game. Can you find your way out of the horrid mansion or will you succumb to your fears? Can you face and overcome your past, or will it break you?

name: Golf with Guns
description: Mini golf with a twist... GUNS! Shoot your own golf ball to move it closer to the hole or shoot an opponent's ball to mess them up. Compete with friends and/or randoms to shoot the lowest score. Enjoy playing your own custom maps or ones made by the community on the Workshop.

name: Rock Tetrus
description: Place the rocks, make a solid line, make the line crumble and fall! There are an infinite amount of strategies! Made by 1 person, inspired by a fake mobile game ad. Enjoy!

name: Minicars: Road to the city!
description: Experience an amazing adventure as a minicar driver. Deliver goods over difficult and dangerous terrain. Build your fleet, develop your infrastructure, make important decisions and fulfill your dreams in this realistic and addictive game.

name: Welcome to Ukraine
description: A puzzle game through which you will discover Ukraine.

name: Timber!
description: Dementia, tragedy and fun - all in the same taste of a potato! Timber! is a 2D point-and-click storydriven game that takes you on an emotional journey. Explore a mix of feelings, from the heart-wrenching struggles of dementia to the unraveling of a tragic story.

name: Aquabyss
description: Aquabyss is a unique steampunk open underwater world inspired by the works of Jules Verne & Herbert G. Wells. In story-driven adventure (optional), you will explore, trade, mine and harvest resources, take missions and encounter pirates, krakens and NPCs.

name: Splice
description: A security job gone wrong. Now you are trapped with something deep inside an underground research bunker, and you are all that is left. Can you overcome your fear in this escape room horror?

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2: Official Level Design Contest - Summer 2020
description:
Welcome to the Summer 2020 SRB2 Official Level Design Contest! A collection of fan-made levels for Sonic Robo Blast 2! We're back online, better than ever!

The entries are as follows:

Single Player:
- Crystal Cave Zone by CST1229
- Toffee Tor Zone, Act 1 by RoyKirbs
- Hypertower Zone by WasifBoomz
- Shadow of Atlantis Zone by akirahedgehog
- Cluttered Cave Zone, Act 2 by Riolucariolu
- Oasis Palace Zone by So2ro
- Rustic Templar Zone by MK.exe
- Valley Falls Zone by Hamsandwich
- Heroes Hall by Zaxel
- Cyan Heights Zone by PencilVoid
- Wasteland Wilds Zone by SunCyclone

- Serene Shore Zone by Krabs

name: Monsters & Mortals: House of Ashes
description: House of Ashes is a new Chapter for Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals.

name: Resistance: Retribution
description: Fueled by vengeance, former British Marine James Grayson intends to destroy the Chimeran conversion centers at any cost. Enlisted by the European resistance, The Maquis, he soon learns the Chimera have evolved a new method of converting humans. Set after events in Resistance: Fall of Man, the war for Europe continues….

name: The Incredible Shrinking Character
description: An cancelled action-adventure game that was developed by Go-Go Interactive Studios and Cyberdreams studios, taking inspiration the novel/film The Incredible Shrinking Man, and is set in a universe reminiscent of 1950's science-fiction and horror movies. The player would have controlled a private investigator looking for a wealthy young woman named Julia Caldwell, who vanished after visiting the castle of a mad scientist named Dr. Warren Franklin, who would use a shrinking ray on the hero. The gameplay would have had the hero venturing through Dr. Franklin's castle, fighting dangers such as animals and heights along the way, of which grow smaller and smaller after each level.

name: Our Fantastic Wonderland
description: A fantasy-adventure visual novel following the adventures of Ignatius the mild-mannered cleric as he tries to return the Jewel of Happiness to the Sacred Altar and restore happiness to the world. Along the way, he recruits a team of allies to his cause, from a foul-mouthed knight, to an imp assassin, to a stubborn prince, and an axe-happy berserker.

name: NarcotizeDR
description:
A short game made in RPGmaker MV, minus the RPG elements. Pronounced as Narcotized.

Investigate Octia’s home and help her complete the goal she’s had tunnel vision over for the last month– Reviving her girlfriend! “I can't seriously be blamed for this...”

Use any means to save her. Cleaning supplies, demonic rituals, unethical medical practices that lead to terrible consequences? No problem! “Don’t worry, it’ll be okay in the end.”

Just make sure to keep her sanity in line. Even the smallest of things will cause more stress to her, and it won't look good if it gets too high. "I can't be left behind..."

Octia has one goal, so help her no matter what. "This time it'll work for sure..."

name: Was/Were
description: Sin descripción

name: Dynasty Warriors 6
description: In the PlayStation 2 version of Dynasty Warriors 6, Ma Chao, Yue Ying, Cao Pi, Zhang He, Taishi Ci, and Ling Tong are given Musou Modes, as well as weapons and movesets that they didn’t have in other versions of the game.

name: Resident Evil 2
description: The Nintendo 64 port of Resident Evil 2 was a very faithful port, with most of the changes being related to the overall cutscene quality, due to storage constraints, and the EX-Files.

name: A 2nd X Thing Episode 2: Digital Groove
description: The sequel to A 2nd X Thing Episode 1: Analog Funk. Demo, Iris, Raocow, Kood, and Sheath are tasked with repairing the universe they broke, and with the power of "jumping real good", travel across time to recover Super Leeks.

name: Ender Magnolia: Bloom in the Mist
description:
Decades after the Rain of Death, a new journey begins in the Land of Fumes, where mystical powers lie beneath the earth. The kingdom’s desire for conquest led to the creation of the Homunculi, machine-like artificial life forms prepared to execute the king’s will. A recent resource-harvesting mission gone awry caused toxic vapors to emerge from underground, driving both man and machine to feral madness.

As the Homonculi devolve into dangerous creatures, guide Lilac –- an “Attuner” with the power to purify those infected by the fumes — on a quest to save the kingdom. With the help of friendly machines and spirits who fight in Lilac’s stead, fend off mechanized legions of lunging carcasses, cannonball-firing corpses and chainsaw-wielding goblins terrorizing the land.

Turn foes into friends by exorcizing corruption from enemy bosses. Wield their powers to add 30 different abilities to Lilac’s combat repertoire in an enhanced battle system where she can equip up to four special abilities at once. Improve Lilac’s odds of surviving this hunt for lost memories by leveling up attack strength, HP, and armor.

Explore the depths, heights and far corners of the kingdom for lore-filled relics. Collect and trade gold for upgraded items at the Blacksmith’s storefront. Combine story fragments from the kingdom’s fleeing inhabitants with Lilac’s forgotten memories. Seek the truth in an atmospheric hand-drawn setting set to the soothing serenades of returning musical group Mili (Ghost in the Shell, Goblin Slayer) with a brand new original soundtrack available for purchase at launch.

name: Arranger: A Role-Puzzling Adventure
description: Find your way in a world of breezy, thoughtful puzzles, along a charming journey of self-discovery.

name: Monster Hunter Stories
description: The first installment of the Monster Hunter Stories series is back and coming to Nintendo Switch, PC, and PlayStation 4! Become a Monster Rider and hatch, raise, and battle with your favorite Monsties in this epic RPG adventure.

name: Epic Mickey: Rebrushed
description: Embark on a magical journey in Disney Epic Mickey: Rebrushed! Shape your adventure with the stroke of a brush and transform Wasteland as Mickey Mouse in this beautifully recreated 3D platformer.

name: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance
description: Embark on this definitive version of the critically acclaimed Shin Megami Tensei V, massively expanded with a brand-new storyline featuring new locations, demons, and choices to make that will dictate the fate of all existence.

name: Star Wars: Battlefront Classic Collection
description:
Fight in iconic battles from across the STAR WARS galaxy!

Play the classic STAR WARS Battlefront games on modern consoles, online and offline in this complete classic collection.

This Classic Collection includes:
STAR WARS Battlefront (Classic)
-Includes Bonus Map: Jabba's Palace
STAR WARS Battlefront II
-Includes Bonus Maps: Bespin: Cloud City, Rhen Var: Harbor, Rhen Var: Citadel, and Yavin 4: Arena
-Includes Bonus Heroes: Asajj Ventress & Kit Fisto

Key Features
Traverse the Galaxy in Campaign Mode & Galactic Conquest
Galactic Conquest: Devise your strategy, recruit your troops, and execute your tactical vision for conquering the galaxy.
STAR WARS Battlefront Campaign: Experience iconic battles from STAR WARS Episodes I-VI
STAR WARS Battlefront II Campaign: Join the rise of Darth Vader’s elite 501st Legion of Stormtroopers

Massive Locations with up to 64-player Online Support
-Fight on the ground: Wookiee Warriors, Jet Troopers, Droidekas and more in massive multiplayer action
-Drive iconic vehicles: Speeder Bikes, AT-STs, AT-RTs, and more in offensive and defensive battles
-Pilot legendary starships: TIE fighters, X-wings, and more in space and air dogfights

Expanded Hero Assault
Hero Assault is playable on all ground maps including: Death Star, Kashyyyk, Kamino, and Naboo for the first time ever
-Fight with heroes: Mace Windu, Yoda, Luke Skywalker, and many others!
-Battle with villains: Darth Maul, General Grievous, Darth Vader, and many others!

name: Sword Art Online: Fractured Daydream
description: In this online co-op action game, enter a distorted version of the SWORD ART ONLINE world. Pick your role in the form of favorite SWORD ART ONLINE characters and team up with 20 players for raids to defeat powerful enemies.

name: Gundam Breaker 4
description: Create your own ultimate Gundam in the newest Gundam Breaker! With more customizable parts than ever before, you finally have the freedom to build your perfect Gunpla. Test it in battle using the brand new dual-weapon system and break parts off of your enemies and add them to your collection.

name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Rumble
description: Join AiAi and friends in Super Monkey Ball Banana Rumble, where you and up to 16 players can compete online across multiple game modes as you aim to become Top Banana! You can also work together with your favorite bunch in 4 player cooperative mode, or slip into a wonderfully crafted story in the all-new Adventure Mode experience!

name: Suika Game: Multi-Player Mode Expansion Pack
description: The popular watermelon game has a new 2-player mode that allows players to play together.

name: Endless Ocean: Luminous
description: Dive in and survey a mysterious underwater world. Take a deep breath and plunge into the Veiled Sea: an unexplored region with discoveries that change with each dive. Encounter and learn about over 500 species of marine life—some of which are presumed extinct, or even mythical!

name: Epigraph
description: Epigraph is a short, challenging, language decipherment puzzle game.

name: Reynatis
description: Fantasy meets reality in Shibuya, Tokyo, where magic is something to be feared. In this action RPG, a young wizard seeks freedom through strength, and an officer seeks to control magic and restore order. When their paths cross, a darkness that will transform the world descends.

name: Mosaico
description: Sin descripción

name: MD Card Game 1
description: An SD card with 10 games from Tec Toy for the MD Play Handheld.

name: MD Card Game 2
description: An SD card with 10 games from Tec Toy for the MD Play Handheld.

name: Hitman: World of Assassination - The Undying Pack
description: Unlock a series of cosmetics inspired by The Undying Elusive Target mission and gain permanent access to The Oroborous - A three-level Arcade contract featuring The Undying Elusive Target.

name: Terminator: Dark Fate
description:
Terminator: Dark Fate, Earth 2041 A.D. Humanity is on the brink of extermination as Terminators and Machines roam the planet seeking to terminate what’s left of humanity. Brave individuals form Resistance groups to battle for the limited resources that remain and fight back against the Terminator machines.

In this dark future, YOU become a leader of the Resistance -establish, build, and upgrade your own hidden Resistance Base, recruit and upgrade troops, research new technologies, and forge relationships with other players in order to defend and expand your territory.

name: Robocop 2D 3
description: One cyborg stands between the OCP army of crazed robotic cops and their plan for complete control... Robocop!

name: Ninja Five-O
description: Ninja Five-O allows players to relive this classic game. Uphold justice with fierce Ninjutsu moves on Steam.

name: Incolatus: Don't Stop, Girlypop!
description: Spread the love! Incolatus is a Y2K girly-pop arena-style movement shooter where standing still is not an option. The faster you go, the more damage you deal and the more you heal! Just. Don’t. Stop. Moving.

name: The Forever Winter
description: The Forever Winter is a co-op tactical survival horror shooter where you and your squad must loot the dead to survive under the shadow of terrifying and gargantuan war machines locked in a never-ending conflict.

name: Mortui: Outbreak Secrets
description: For some unknown reason, the zombie virus has taken over the world and zombies are everywhere. The question is; This pandemic is unnatural?

name: Daughter
description:
Daughter is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame starring Edel, an old lady who lives alone and refuses to enter the rooms of her home besides her own. You may explore her dreams while she waits for her family to visit her.

As you explore her dreams, you can collect Edel's power fantasies (effects) which are "better" versions of her that will help you go deeper, and the deeper you go eventually you'll be able to open the doors and find what is Edel hiding.

name: Kylie Minogue: Breathe (1998).mp3
description: Game sounds brain dump

name: Plants vs. Zombies: Match
description:
Plants vs Zombies meets Match 3 puzzles - This ain’t your garden variety match 3 game!

Grow your match 3 puzzle skills and join Dave on a totally new Plants vs Zombies adventure game. Those wacky zombies are dead set on making life in Neighborville rather dim. It’s time to let your matching puzzle skills shine as bright as the Sun -- because you’ll need to collect it, recruit your favorite leafy friends, stem the tide of yet another quirky zombie horde, and save Neighborville… you know the drill!

name: Cordillera
description: Take Aethel and her friend Luna on an adventure across the beautiful Cordillera. To save an ancient people on the brink of extinction from an Old Evil.

name: Plants vs. Zombies 2: A Journey Through Time and Space
description: it's time! "Plants vs. Zombies 2 - A Journey Through Time and Space" has landed in China. The epic struggle between plants and zombies will continue in different time and space dimensions! New plants, new zombies, new gameplay, combined with the most advanced touch screen technology, players can break the traditional tower defense and directly join the zombie resistance war. With the return of Plants vs. Zombies 2, Crazy Dave, new touch screen super props, new magical plant energy, and new ways to protect your brain, come and join Crazy Dave in his crazy adventure through time and space! The previous game of "Plants vs. Zombies 2" is "Plants vs. Zombies" which has won more than 30 Game of the Year awards and has hundreds of millions of fans around the world.

name: Immortals Must Die
description:
Indie Roquelite 2d

Kill hordes of demons as you unlock new items and skills, complete quests, upgrade your equipment and discover different ways of getting through the challenges that await you.

name: Flyhight Cloudia
description: Flyheight Cloudia is a Japanese-style RPG released for mobile phones. The game takes place in Cloudia, a world made up of floating islands above

name: Plants vs. Zombies: Endless Edition
description: Plants vs. Zombies: Endless Edition was a Chinese-exclusive extension of Plants vs. Zombies. It included content based on the Chinese novel, Journey to the West. It was later discontinued in 2015 for unknown reasons.

name: Tippy Pads
description: Tilt the floor and roll to the hole!

name: Little Racers + Red Wings: American Aces
description: Rev up your gaming experience! They say the 'sky is the limit,' and in Red Wings: American Aces, it's yours to conquer. And if your thirst for an adrenaline-fueled adventure persists, Little Racer is here to ensure it's thoroughly satisfied.

name: Jet Moto 2
description: A port of Jet Moto 2, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: The New Denpa Men
description:
Scour radio waves for the Denpa Men: small creatures that call these invisible signals their home.

The New Denpa Men is a free-to-play RPG where you can collect these Denpa Men for your party and adventure with them as your companions. In addition to the main adventure, you can decorate your island, fish, participate in limited-time events, and play against other players.

name: Guitar Life: Lesson 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Ichorous
description:
A long-imprisoned God of Blood has made you their disciple. Kill their monstrosities still roaming the land and return the godly blood, Ichor, to restore your Patron to their full power.

Master the Offerings of The Patron and combine them for crazy synergies and boosts!

name: The Hokkaido Serial Murder Case: The Okhotsk Disappearance - Memories in Ice, Tearful Figurine
description:
The legendary Okhotsk Disappearance... is coming back.

A Nipopo doll sheds a tear—another soul is sheds its mortal coil.
One morning, a man's body is found floating in the Tokyo bay.
He's estimated to be in his forties.
But the incident doesn't stop here. It moves to Hokkaido's cities: Kushiro, Abashiri, Shiretoko, Monbetsu...
A second and third murder link the northern island to Tokyo.

The Okhotsk Disappearance is a graphic adventure game where you play as a police detective.
Your job is to find the truth behind the serial murders with the help of your subordinates.
To do so, you have a command interface with 14 actions, such as "Change Location" and "Ask someone".

A RPG Maker exploration/adventure game about a girl doing her homework, and a small world at its tail end.

Become the backbone of a new society ruled by man's mind and heart.
