name: The Projet Poulet
description: Help the brave chicken go through dozens of interesting puzzle levels where you must show wit and make timely decisions.

name: Faith in Despair
description: Build your own cards, find game-breaking synergies and dominate Satan's army of demons in this roguelike deckbuilder.

name: Strong Fortress
description: This is a Star Wars-themed shooter where the player takes on the role of the protagonist as he pilots a mech to guard a fortress, while managing resources and building a business to take on a battle against alien creatures as the level rounds progress.

name: SprintLine
description: Can you make it to the end of the line?

name: Five Hundred
description: The classic Five Hundred card game, available on PC! This version of the game has been lovingly crafted over many years to be the best possible version of the game it can be, now available on Steam!

name: The Reason for Your Smile
description: A visual novel telling the story of Shun Kousaka, a college student starting into a new chapter of his life. Experience and decide his journey through the perils of love as you work towards achieving his biggest dream: Getting a girlfriend!

name: Ruined
description: The world has been RUINED. You awake to a mysterious world overrun by monsters. Journey through the mountains with an army of monsters by your side to uncover the secrets of this world and rebuild hope!

name: The Corridors
description: Unravel sanity's edge in The Corridors. Hop, solve, survive – or feed the shadows.

name: Byte Hack
description: ByteHack is a puzzle platformer where you play as an agent from the hip new anti-malware software, Morton. Fight against the infected GPU system as the computer slowly gets more and more destroyed.

name: I commissioned some stickmen
description: I paid artists to hide stickmen and paper planes in 15 artworks. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Targeosity Horror
description: Explore an abandoned house with a monster. Play pixel mini games to escape from a maniac trap. Solve puzzles in terrible darkness until the monster hears. Overcome panic attacks using a demonic device.

name: 1114: Robin Hood Survivors
description: Help Robin Hood and his Merry Men to defeat Bad King John in a bullet heaven pixel adventure. 1114:Robin Hood Survivors is a casual, rogue-lite, top-down game where your choices are extremely important. Fight hundreds of forest enemies on screen at once.

name: Ephemeral Descent
description: Etherium Decent plays in a abandoned hospital where the army conducted experiments. This Is My First Game That I Developed Myself. As the sole developer, I would be very happy to receive your criticism in order to keep improving.

name: The Devil's Typist
description: Random and endless typing game with rich elements and items.

name: The Lancaster Leak: Entity Exam
description: Another tape has been leaked, this time a recording of a training protocol. By answering questions and resisting jumpscares, can you beat the Entity Exam?

name: Solar Serpent Squadron
description: Solar Serpent Squadron is a survivor bullet heaven game with snake-like movement. You will build your snake "body" as weapons, and destroy hundreds of enemies swarm coming right at you!

name: Building Block Cities: Fire Copter Drills
description: This game includes two major parts: building a city scene using the given building blocks and finishing fire copter drills on the scene. The building blocks can be assembled by matching color-coded faces on the blocks, and a drill is finished after the fire copter flies through all waypoint gates.

name: AI Stories: Machine Angel
description: Will you help a serving, chocolate loving and card playing daemon? Will you dance with a gardening space game playing worm? Will you Repair all 50 robots and bring back 600 Machine Bacteria in this first person parkour movement shooter and become The Angel of Mars?

name: Dinos vs. Robots
description: Dinos vs. Robots - Robots from the Future time travel to the Present to fight Dinos from the Past.

name: Chronicles Of Sagrea
description: Enter the medieval fantasy world of Sagrea with one of its three characters in this action-adventure game. Explore different locations and face numerous enemies with an intense combo-based combat system to discover the threat that looms over the realms.

name: Panzer Rollen
description: Panzer Rollen is a WW2 tank game. In the formal version, you fight in historically reconstructed Japanese castles. You can learn Samurai's defense doctrine "Yokoya-o-kakeru" (横矢をかける）, which means making a flank attack on the enemy.

name: Sklime
description: Embark on a gripping ascent in Sklime, where your tenacity is tested at every ledge in the treacherous Depths. With two resilient arms, hoist yourself from the shadows to the promised light above. How high can you climb before the Depths reclaim you?

name: I'll be Brave, Tomorrow
description: A first-person narrative adventure game, telling the story of a sick child playing a 2D platformer. This game is in support of Great Ormond Street Hospital Charity!

name: Ghouls Of Divinity
description: Command a ghoul civilization with an innovative physics-based RTS system, complex AI interactions, and a rich skill tree. Strategy meets divinity in an immersive god game experience.

name: Pogo Pogo
description: I put together this game to upset a certain kind of individual.

name: Slimes are the Strongest
description: You're just a slime and everyone will win against you in a battle? Don't worry, multiply and increase the numbers of yourself and overcome everything in your path! Use your brains to become stronger than anyone ever imagined a slime could be. Are you ready to multiply?

name: Fogreach: Shadow Whisperers
description: Fogreach: Shadow Whisperers plunges you into a mysterious mountain town veiled in perpetual fog. As investigator Sarah, decipher puzzles, confront psychological horrors, and shape your destiny through critical choices. Confront the unknown, shatter the curse, and unveil secrets hidden in shadows.

name: Hidden Clues
description: Crack the cases! The murders are escalating in the city! Follow the clues to crack the cases and arrest the killers!

name: A Weekend Trip
description: A point-and-click adventure about a trip with friends over the weekend. Help your friends, explore the place, hang around or just enjoy the scenery. Decide what River does during this trip.

name: RPG Conquer the World
description: Pixel art RPG adventure. Experience the story of a common young boy, visit school, fight enemies, find your first love, and most importantly: Conquer the world!

name: Tank Defence
description: Tank Defense - A game in the Top Down Shooter genre, where the player controls a tank with the mouse and the movement of a soldier with the keyboard. The game is designed for two players who work together to resist hordes of enemies and help each other pass levels.

name: Mouse Clicker
description: Mouse Clicker, you can spam to whatever you want. You can use it as macro. You can set cordinatte to function. Also u can set key and function easily. That tool is helping for gamers.

name: Remember Us
description: "Remember Us" is an emotional adventure game where you witness the final moments of Dean, an Alzheimer's patient, as he tries to remember his beloved wife Marta and his past before passing away. Find objects, revive memories, and discover Dean's poignant farewell moment.

name: Ocean Desolation
description: Ocean Desolation is a Free Simple Linear horror game. After falling out of your boat during a thunderstorm you are left stranded in the South Pacific Ocean. Swim your way to different locations and find a way to call for help. But be careful, something lurks at the bottom.

name: Trucker Joe 2
description: As a trucker, you take control of your own freight company, buying trucks, expanding your fleet and transporting goods across fantastic landscapes. Overcome challenges, upgrade your vehicles and experience the thrill of the trucking business.

name: Duskpunk
description: Dredgeport: a steampunk city spiralling out of control. Gangs roam the slums, and the corpses of the dead are processed for fuel. You’ve escaped the great war, but can you escape starvation? Inspired by the freedom of TTRPGs, explore the city, choose your friends, and shape the city’s future.

name: PawPrint
description: A cloud cat simulation operation game. This is a game for people who have lost their cats in real life, in this game, players can DIY their own cat image.Players can run with cat,earn gold coins, buy cat food in the cat star scene, and continue to complete the fate of feeding and accompanying cats.

name: Spartacus Card Game
description: Spartacus Card Game is a Gladiator Fighting Card Game for 1 to 2 players.

name: Idosra: The Electric Renaissance
description: Explore the distant future in Idosra, an action-adventure RPG set in a world on the verge of rediscovering electricity. Follow Marika's quest to uncover the motives of the Vallas Empire. Learn dozens of new skills, meet a wide cast of characters, and discover the secrets of the lost city Idosra.

name: Hotel Business Simulator
description: Welcome, Hospitality Maestros! Dive into "Hotel Business Simulator where you craft the ultimate empire. Upgrade rooms, cater to guests' whims, set rates wisely, and maintain spotless standards. Your journey to mogul status begins now. Ready to build the hotel of your dreams? Game on!

name: Qi
description: Single one-boss-fight turn-based rpg. Sakura has asked Ryu to meet him at the school. She seems to have something important to tell him.

name: James Patterson's Women's Murder Club
description: Sin descripción

name: The Sims 4: Crystal Creations
description: Craft dazzling jewelry and give your creations a spark of power with The Sims 4 Crystal Creations Stuff Pack.

name: Slime Drop

description: VT03 port of Mad Xmas.

name: Final Man
description: VT03 port of Final Man.

name: Spy Hunter
description: The NES port of Spy Hunter, a driving action game played from an overhead point of view. Your car is equipped with machine guns to help you get past the numerous enemies out on the road (be careful not to shoot any civilians, though!) Occasionally you will come across a weapons van, and if you drive into the back of the van your car becomes equipped with a second weapon (such as smoke screen, oil slick, or missiles). At several points the road splits and you can enter a boathouse which transforms your car into a boat temporarily. If you drive far enough the seasons change as well (watch out for icy conditions during winter!). The enemy cars will do anything to stop you, including running you off the road, firing guns from the back of a limo, or dropping bombs from a helicopter.

name: M_Day
description: VT03 (16-bit graphics) port of M_Day.

description: VT03 (16-bit graphics) port of Sky Dreamer.

name: Adventure to Fate Lost Island
description: A Turn-Based RPG Game that is Accessible to the blind and visually impaired. Fully playable by all and indie-created.

name: The Last Explorer
description:
Discover an alien world, study and befriend creatures and take beautiful photos along the way.

Explore an open world full of creatures to learn more about, find all the wreckage from your spaceship and use your camera to learn more about the creatures, the world and how you got there.

Throughout your journey you'll be able to do quests for the aliens or just play minigames with them.

Use your camera to take beautiful photos and analyze your environment. Throughout your journey you'll find new effects to take even better and more unique photos.

There are many different creatures you can study, photograph and befriend. Photograph them to learn more and use bait to befriend and ride them.

Find out how your ship crashed and what happened to the other astronauts by exploring the island and photographing the wreckage to analyze it and learn more.

The Last Explorer features:
- A beautiful open world you can explore any way you want
- Complex creatures to study and befriend
- Small side quests
- A highly customizable camera system
- Many interesting camera effects
- Old spaceship wreckage to learn more about
- A mystery to uncover
- Land, Air and Water creatures
- Xbox controller support

name: Diamond
description: VT03 (16-bit graphics) port of Diamond.

description: Saints Row: Money Shot is a cancelled game in the Saints Row series, intended to take place between Saints Row 2 and Saints Row: The Third.

description: Demons and Trolls have invaded the realm in this challenging expansion. Take on over 120 new adventures as a Demonologist, command cultists, and grow demonic spirits in your hapless minions. Face terrible demon lords or enter dangerous pacts with them.

name: Dirge of Cerberus: Final Fantasy VII International
description: Dirge of Cerberus: Final Fantasy VII International retains the new features incorporated into the North American and European releases.

name: All Games Yume Game Studio

name: Jinsei Owata no Daibouken 2
description: A sequel to Jinsei Owata no Daibouken, set in a world of ASCII art that is disappearing along with support for Adobe Flash Player. It's gameplay is quite similar to the first game and was launched aiming to be the last flash game.

name: Kaiju Wars + Legend of Keepers: Monsters & Demons Deluxe Bundle

description: Grab your squad and experience the past, present, and future of hoops culture in NBA 2K24. Enjoy loads of pure, authentic action and limitless personalized MyPLAYER options in MyCAREER. Collect an impressive array of legends and build your perfect lineup in MyTEAM. Feel more responsive gameplay and polished visuals while playing with your favorite NBA and WNBA teams in PLAY NOW.

name: Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree Deluxe Edition
description:
Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree Deluxe Edition includes:

• The base game
• The Shadow of the Erdtree expansion
• The base game's Digital Artbook & Original Soundtrack
• The Shadow of the Erdtree expansion's Artbook & Soundtrack

name: Warhammer Bundle: Chaos Gate & Realms of Ruin
description: Put your strategic skills to the test in the grim darkness of the far future and across the Realms of Ghur with the Warhammer Bundle - Chaos Gate & Realms of Ruin. Includes Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate - Daemonhunters & Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin.

name: Senshi Sokoban Quest
description: Exciting traditional Sokoban game! Properly position the boxes on the markers before time runs out, but be careful not to lose hearts. Use lightning bolts to restart levels and earn more points by completing them quickly. Have fun and challenge your mind!

name: Thunder Ray: Origins
description: Sin descripción

name: Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate - Daemonhunters: Purifier Edition
description: Lead the Grey Knights to exterminate the forces of Chaos in fast-paced, brutal, turn-based tactical combat. Personalise and equip your elite squad of Daemonhunters to purge the deadly corruption of The Bloom as it spreads in a galaxy-spanning campaign.

name: Scientist 2023
description:
Scientist 2023 is a Doom II partial conversion megawad by Roland van der Velden, first released on August 10, 2023, as a new official add-on for the Doom Classic Unity port, before seeing a standalone release as a PWAD 15 days later.

Scientist 2023 is a remake of 2002's Scientist and 2005's Scientist 2, two WADs by Roland Van der Velden featuring similar levels and themes. The 2023 remake features revamped levels, some remade from scratch, and also new graphics, weapons and enemies, with a remarkably different aesthetic from the previous works.

name: Maguro Macho Adventure
description:
Maguro Macho Adventure is a platform game that is forced to move.
Maguro Macho has to keep running to beat the stage and get oxygen.

All stages are 5 stages.

name: The Jackbox Party Quintpack 2.0
description: The Jackbox Party Quintpack 2.0 is a collection of 25 fan-favorite Jackbox games from Party Packs 6-10 for one low price. It's great for game nights with friends, family get-togethers, and more! And there's no special equipment required - your internet-connected device is your controller.

name: Kemoverse Online
description: Kemoverse Online is an online socializing game where you live your life as a Kemonae, in the world of the Kemoverse - a worldbuilding project set in a post-apocalyptic furry world.

name: Weedcraft Inc + Legend of Keepers: Underworld Business Bundle
description: Get two strategy games in one bundle: Weedcraft Inc and Legend of Keepers!

name: Weedcraft Inc + Legend of Keepers: Underworld Business Deluxe Bundle
description: Get two strategy games in one bundle: Weedcraft Inc and Legend of Keepers!

name: I Wanna Save the Kids!
description:
I Wanna Save the Kids (also known as IWSTK) is a freeware indie video game published by Mike "Kayin" O'Reilly, its creator, in late 2007 worldwide on his official website. It is the prequel to I Wanna Be the Guy (despite being released after it) and therefore chronologically the first game in the I Wanna Be the Guy series.

The game's mechanics are inspired by the game Lemmings: The Kid must manage to save some children, who advance regardless of the dangers, and bring them to a safe place in a kind of house. To do this he has several tools at his disposal, but most of the time he is forced to obtain these tools by overcoming IWBTG-worthy maps, complete with spikes, falling cherries and more.

name: Elevator Zero
description: Elevator Zero is a first-person exploration and puzzle game in which you have to progress by finding anomalies.

name: Cropsmare!
description: Cropsmare! is a sokoban-like puzzle game inspired by Adventures of Lolo.

name: Le Chat Fonce: Gnome Cafe
description:
Delicious Gnome Coffee? The Famous Tim's is back in town and our friend Chat Fonce doesn't have the money to buy it!

Help our friend to find some coins and buy some delicious delicacy!

name: Summit
description: A tree reaches towards the heavens. Do you wish to understand it?

name: Desktop Baseball 2
description: Get ready for an all-new and improved baseball experience! Assemble an original team like no other!

name: Arcade Archives: Jungler
description:
"Jungler " is an action game released by KONAMI in 1981.
Defeat the enemies wandering around the maze-like stage.
If you hit the tail with a shot, the body will become one length shorter.
To defeat an enemy, either erase their entire body with a shot or hit your head against the head of an enemy that is the same length or shorter than you.
If you pick up the "strawberry" in the stage, you can make your body one length longer.

name: Fortnite Festival: Season 2
description: Get ready to go gaga as the legendary superstar, Lady Gaga, becomes the Icon for Fortnite Festival Season 2: Unlock Your Talent!

name: Khan Academy Kids: Learning!
description: Khan Academy Kids makes learning fun with thousands of educational games, books, and activities that inspire a lifetime of learning and discovery for children ages 2-8.

name: Kingmaker
description: Create a King by choosing the origins, title, and infamous event of a ruler. A unique story will generate that outlines your King's reign, and how it ends...

name: Sheep in Wolf's Clothing
description: 'Sheep in Wolf's Clothes' is a short interactive visual novel, where you collect sheep that got stolen.

name: Hot Potato Online
description: Blast your opposition with a potato bomb while avoiding incinerating yourself in this original arcade sport! Enter the arena with three local or online friends and AIs in teams or free-for-all. Customize the match options and create your own arenas using the map editor.

name: LurkBait Twitch Fishing
description: A Twitch powered interactive cozy fishing idle game.

name: I'm Not a Creep (I Promise)
description: A short visual novel where you make a tea for a cute boy.

name: Monopoly
description: The classic game of Monopoly comes to mobile with the same goal as the original. Shake your device to roll the dice, tap to manage your purchased properties, and build hotels your opponents cannot afford. You can challenge up to three friends via local Wi-Fi or Pass and Play modes.

name: Alien Reign
description: Alien Reign is a cancelled sci-fi real time strategy game in development by SquareSoft USA (Redmond) in late 1995 / early 1996. While the project was still in early concept phase when it was canned and no console was decided yet, by looking at the partnership between Squaresoft and Sony in 1996 we can speculate that if only completed Alien Reign could have been released on the original Playstation, and maybe on PC.

name: Need for Speed: Undercover
description: Get behind the wheel of the world's #1 racing franchise, rebuilt from the tires-up just for your mobile devices. Take on cops in raging, realistic street battles as you corner and drift through fire and smoke at 150mph+. Drive the world's fastest, hottest cars through gnarly crash scenes enhanced with 3D graphics. Music keeps you pumped while you tear up the road in this action-packed adventure of hot pursuit and betrayal!

name: Minagara Oreru DS Origami
description: A Japanese DS game that teaches origami.

name: Uranai Demo Shite Miyouka DS
description: A DS fortune-telling game.

name: Seifuku Kanojo: School Girlfriend
description: Seifuku Kanojo: School Girlfriend is love visual novel where you get close with a girl wearing a uniform.

name: Hello Kitty's Pie Shop
description: This game puts the adorable Hello Kitty in her kitchen as she gets ready to bake a pie, and you'll be helping her out to create the most delicious pies in the world!

name: Hebereke no Pair Pair Wars
description: An unreleased puzzle game developed by SNK for the Neo Geo. Why it got cancelled is unknown.

name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour
description: Play the only iPhone/iPod touch game that lets you golf AS OR AGAINST Tiger Woods! Beat Tiger at his own game and step onto legendary courses around the world! Watch each fairway come to life with 3D graphics, dynamic camera angles, and realistic sounds. Take on other PGA pros and hear play-by-play commentary by Sam Torrance and Kelly Tilghman. Use the Swing Meter and get visual feedback to help you achieve the perfect swing! Tee it up with Tiger Woods PGA TOUR by EA Sports - anytime, anywhere!

name: They Need To Be Fed 3
description:
360 degree gravity platforming is back! Run, jump, collect, avoid enemies and feed yourself to the monster at the end!

"They Need To Be Fed" is a platformer game in which you can walk in all directions: 360 degree gravity ensures you can never fall off. The series has received very positive reviews so far, and is even bigger now!

name: Let's Hide the Body! (Tee-hee~)
description:
This is a simple decorating game but with a little twist.

Features:
* Cartoonish blood and very funny dead body!
* MC Paint aesthetic you probably missed... did you not?
* Technically there's still a cute boy in the corner, so you know... additional points, right??
* Around 40 objects to decorate with.
* Guilty fishb

name: Asterisk no Daibouken
description:
One of the only games successfully dumped from a Game Processor RAM Cassette. This was a student game project developed in the HAL College of Technology & Design (no relation to HAL Laboratory).

This game was dumped from a Game Processor RAM Cassette in 2005 by d4s. It was originally thought that the data was deteriorating but I am starting to believe it wasn't aside from a few bits.

The goal of the game is to take the coin at the end of the level, then go back and defeat the boss by hitting it 5 times with either the sword or the fireball, then the credits would appear.

GAME CREDITS:

アスタリスクの大冒險

企画
寺西 祐樹

リーダー

Character Design
Kentaro Onuma

name: Gigantic: Rampage Edition
description: Gigantic: Rampage Edition is a premium and definitive release of the original 5v5 MOBA Hero Shooter, Gigantic, that provides a dynamic and exciting team-based multiplayer experience for fans of both genres. Choose from a diverse roster of unique heroes, each with a set of upgradeable abilities, and team up with four other players to control objectives and take down the opposing team’s mighty Guardian, all while protecting your own. Gigantic: Rampage Edition includes a new game mode, cross platform play, new heroes, new maps, and gameplay improvements that give fans a bigger and more complete GIGANTIC experience than ever before, while welcoming new players to the action and fun-filled world of a Hero Shooter.

name: Metal Beans
description: Metal Beans is a 3D Action-Arcade game where you control two desktop pets in a computer space. Protect the PC from digital threats by charging up your way through virus creatures and upgrading your robots in the system!

name: Dead End Exit 8
description: This is a thriller game based on memory puzzles that supports PC play and VR mode. The theme is inspired by people's depression and tension while waiting in the hospital.In an infinite loop space, one must carefully observe all abnormal information and strive to escape from the infinite space

name: Nanny's Journey
description:
Nanny didn't come to knit!
Get ready to jump, run, grab everything you can in this dynamic platform game. Use a grappling hook to propel yourself through a hellish level to the surface.

name: A.P.B.
description: A port of the Arcade game APB for Atari Lynx.

name: APB
description: A port of the Arcade game APB for Amstrad CPC.

name: APB
description: A port of the Arcade game APB for Commodore 64.

name: APB
description: A port of the Arcade game APB for Atari ST.

name: APB
description: A port of the Arcade game APB for DOS.

name: APB
description: A port of the Arcade game APB for ZX Spectrum.

name: Garten of Banban: Punchrush
description:
Official Garten of Banban: Punchrush!
Punch your way through Banban's Kindergarten while playing with all the characters!

name: The Penjikent Creature
description: The Penjikent Creature is a terrifying, short horror experience inspired by the real-life Penjikent Murals in Tajikistan.

name: Replay
description: After a long and busy day, you found this old looking game on your way home, it seems interesting so you take it with you.

name: Taboo: The Sixth Sense
description: Taboo: The Sixth Sense is a tarot card reading simulation developed by Rare for the NES. This video game gives users a tarot reading where the "dealer" automatically shuffles the cards.

name: Spirit of the Sky
description: You are a Brave young Seer, sent out by your village to stop the Endless Snowstorm which is destroying your village's crops and killing it's people.

name: Mega Man RPG: Prototype
description: Mega Man RPG Prototype is a browser-based fangame where you square off against hordes of increasingly challenging robot masters in turn-based battles, paying tribute to the battle systems of retro role-playing games released in the late 80s and early 90s. Prototype merges the combat and collection mechanics of the Pokémon series with the beloved characters and special weapons of the classic Mega Man series to create something familiar yet unexplored. The story unfolds in the original series timeline and features elements from across those games, but Battle Network fans may also recognize a familiar face or two. With three distinct campaigns, more than a hundred playable characters, and an ever-expanding array of unique abilities, there's a wealth of discovery awaiting in The Prototype.

name: Mario Starcatcher 2
description: A flash game where each small level has Mario working his way to reach the star at the end.

name: Artifact
description: Find the Four Artifacts on each of their islands to unlock the secret of this strange and lonely place.
